title.narrative: Renforcement à la réponse d’urgence conjointe pour les pour les populations nouvellement déplacées et les membres des communautés d’accueil dans les régions du Centre-Nord, de l’Est et du Sahel

description.narrative: The main objective of this project is to provide life-saving shelter and essential household item assistance to internally displaced persons and host communities in Ouadalan and Yagha (Sahel region), Gourma and Tapoa (Est region) and Sanmatenga and Namentenga (Centre-Nord region). This UNHCR project provides in-kind shelter assistance and cash transfers to enable households to meet their shelter and essential household item needs. The project provides life-saving assistance to 13,370 people, including 3,075 women, 2,350 men, 7,945 children, and 976 persons with disabilities.
